headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KOREY, DORIS BRODER

snippet: KOREY--Doris Broder, beloved wife of the late Saul R. Korey, mother of three and loving grandmother and great-grandmother, died February 27th, family was by her side. Doris was a talented social worker, an avid reader and the best friend Israel ever had. Shiva at her home Tuesday - Thursday evening. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KOREY--Doris Broder, beloved wife of the late Saul R. Korey, mother of three and loving grandmother and great-grandmother, died February 27th, family was by her side. Doris was a talented social worker, an avid reader and the best friend Israel ever had. Shiva at her home Tuesday - Thursday evening. 1/3
